snippet: Internet service that is inexpensive and lightning quick has allowed the city to attract high-tech businesses, talent and capital.
abstract: Chattanooga, Tenn, has what city officials and analysts say is one of the fastest and least expensive, high-speed Internet services in United States; service has attracted high-tech businesses, talent and capital.
lead_paragraph: Internet service that is inexpensive and lightning quick has allowed the city to attract high-tech businesses, talent and capital.

headline.main: Fast Internet Is Chattanooga’s New Locomotive
